dc_creator_sm: University of Michigan. China Data Center.
dc_description_s: REMOTE DOWNLOAD NOT AVAILABLE - please contact data@library.columbia.edu for access. China Counties with 2010  Short Form Population Census Data is a polygon theme representing counties in China as of 2010.  Attribute information includes a number of variables from thecensus short form representing the population as of November 1, 2010.   The short form contains items that reflect the basic situation of the population and the sample was 100% of households.
dc_title_s: China Counties and Short Form Census Data, 2010
